alert.note: Alert for Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 3:38PM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Ulster County. * WHEN...Through 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could be near an inch per hour into this evening. Snow will change to sleet and freezing rain this evening before temperatures rise above freezing tonight. Power outages are possible due to gusty winds this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
